title: Sustainability Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Sustainability domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

sustainabilityID.description: Unique identifier for the sustainability element

title.description: The name or title of the sustainability element

description.description: A detailed explanation of the sustainability element

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this sustainability element

orgUnitRoles.description: Specific roles within the organization unit that manage this sustainability element

sustainabilityScope.description: Organizational scope covered by this sustainability element

regulatoryRequirements.description: Compliance obligations related to this sustainability element

voluntaryCommitments.description: Non-regulatory commitments related to this sustainability element

targetYear.description: Year when target should be achieved

alignmentStandard.description: Standard or framework aligned with this target

alignedObjectives.description: Strategic objectives supported by this sustainability element

alignmentDescription.description: Description of how this element aligns with strategy

resourceAllocation.description: Resources allocated to this sustainability element

keyStakeholders.description: Key stakeholders concerned with this element

keyRisks.description: Key risks associated with this element

dependencies.description: Other domains, processes, or systems supporting this sustainability element

domainType.description: Type of domain the dependency relates to

relatedSustainabilityElements.description: Other sustainability elements with relationships to this one

lastUpdated.description: Date when this sustainability element was last updated

impactID.description: Unique identifier for the environmental impact

impactTitle.description: Name of the specific environmental impact

impactDescription.description: Detailed explanation of the environmental impact

orgUnitTitle.description: Organization unit responsible for this impact

sustainabilityID.description: ID of the sustainability domain this impact belongs to

interimTargets.description: Interim targets on path to main target

initiativeID.description: Unique identifier for the social initiative

initiativeTitle.description: Name of the specific social initiative

initiativeDescription.description: Detailed explanation of the social initiative

orgUnitTitle.description: Organization unit responsible for this initiative

sustainabilityID.description: ID of the sustainability domain this initiative belongs to

businessImpact.description: Effect on business operations and outcomes

practiceID.description: Unique identifier for the governance practice

practiceTitle.description: Name of the specific governance practice

practiceDescription.description: Detailed explanation of the governance practice

orgUnitTitle.description: Organization unit responsible for this practice

sustainabilityID.description: ID of the sustainability domain this practice belongs to

responsibleParties.description: Who is accountable for this practice

strategyID.description: Unique identifier for the sustainability strategy

strategyTitle.description: Name of the specific sustainability strategy

strategyDescription.description: Detailed explanation of the sustainability strategy

orgUnitTitle.description: Organization unit responsible for this strategy

sustainabilityID.description: ID of the sustainability domain this strategy belongs to

strategicPriorities.description: Key focus areas of the strategy

stakeholderAlignment.description: How strategy aligns with stakeholder expectations

integrationWithBusinessStrategy.description: How sustainability connects with overall strategy

integrationLevel.description: Level of integration with business strategy
